text: aur yaad karo jabaki marayam ke bete eesa ne kaha, "ai isaraeel kee santaan! main tumhaaree or bheja hua allaah ka rasool hoon. main tauraat kee (us bhavishyavaanee kee) pushti karata hoon jo mujhase pahale se vidyamaan hai aur ek rasool kee shubh soochana deta hoon jo mere baad aaega, usaka naam ahamad hoga." kintu vah jab unake paas spatjo pramaanon ke saath aaya to unhonne kaha, "yah to jaadoo hai.
